summary: AN ORDINANCE granting to the Swedish Hospital Medical Center, its successors and assigns, a renewable ten year permission to construct, maintain and operate an overhead pedestrian bridge across the pedestrian walk-way established pursuant to Ordinance 101873 across the southeasterly ten (10) feet of Lots 3 and 4 and the abutting segment of vacated alley in Block 101, Terry's Second Addition, specifying the conditions, and providing for acceptance.
